bibl.title: Vine and Acanthus: Decorative Themes in the Wall-paintings of Kellis
The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: Helen Whitehouse, Vine and Acanthus: Decorative Themes in the Wall-paintings of Kellis
